name: Asteroids (itch) (Grumpy Custard)
description:
This is the classic game of asteroids that has been around since the beginning of time. I made this to practice my programming skills, and to see what it's like to actually finish a project.

Game features endless play, see if you can get the top score. The game will remember your scores from each playthrough, so you don't have to start again from scratch each time you pick it up to play.

Now supporting gamepad controls!
